content: i love cats so i wanted to make a crochet cat applique to attach to some projects i checked online among free and paid patterns but i didn t find exactly what i was searching for so i decided to create my own pattern and i m happy to share it with you i also used this cat applique to create a cat granny square free pattern available here at this link 1 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cat-granny-square-2
